uses: The haunted mirror shows you what the ghost room/favorite room is
Also helps confirm if the ghost changes its favorite room during an investigation
facts: It DOES NOT show you where the ghost currently is
While looking into the mirror, it drains 7% sanity per second and a minimum of 20% per use
If you run out of sanity, the mirror will break and a cursed hunt will start

uses: Lures the ghost. The ghost will actively look for the music box
Since it lures the ghost, it can be used for photos and controlling hunts
facts: Being close to the music box while it is playing will drain your sanity
If you throw the music box instead of placing it, it will break and start a cursed hunt
While holding the ouija board press right click/right mouse button. The planchette will land and the Ouija is now 'on'
Anyone can ask it questions if they're close enough
Asking questions uses sanity. Some questions use more sanity than others
If the person who summoned the planchette walks too far away from the ouija board it will explode and start a cursed hunt. Make sure to say 'goodbye!'

questions.description: Get ghost location. Doesn't specify the ghost's favorite room
Yes or not answer if the ghost is near
Play hide and seek with the ghost ;)
questions: (Do you want to play) hide and seek?
answers: Ouija board will count down from 5 to 0, try to beat the ghost ;)

questions.description: Get age of the ghost. Thayes will age periodically during the run
answers: 2 - 90. Thayes can go over this limit, while aging during the run

questions.description: Years since death of the ghost
questions: How long have you been dead?
How many years ago did you die?
How long have you been here?
How long ago did you die?

questions.description: Get a rough estimate of your sanity

facts: Anyone near the summoning circle when candles are lit will also lose sanity
When all candles are lit the ghost will be trapped in the circle for a few seconds or as short as one second. Be prepared with your camera and smudge stick!
There are a total of 10 different tarot cards
Each deck has 10 draws and you can draw any card more than once

cards.name: The Tower
cards.effect: Forces an interaction and doubles ghost activity for 20 seconds

cards.name: The Wheel of Fortune
cards.effect: Gain 25% sanity [Green Burn], Lose 25% sanity [Red Burn]

cards.name: The Fool
cards.effect: Does nothing. The Fool is techincally already drawn and the game rolls 1/9 randomly to see which card it will display before revealing the fool

cards.name: The Hermit
cards.effect: Forces an interaction and doubles ghost activity for 20 seconds

cards.name: The High Priestess
cards.effect: Resurrects a dead player. If there is more than one dead player the card will resurrect a random dead player. If there are no dead players then the card will resurrect the next player to die

facts: Pricking the voodoo doll uses 5% sanity
You can prick the voodoo doll up to 10 times
Each prick has a chance to prick the heart, which will start a cursed hunt
If using the voodoo doll reduces your sanity to 0% it will use all pricks and start a cursed hunt
Monkey Paw is one of the 7 cursed possessions that has a 1/7 chance to spawn on any map when your difficulty allows it. Some are hidden quite well.

wishes.wish: I wish to see the ghost
positiveEffects: Triggers a ghost event at the ghost location
negativeEffects: Initiates a hunt immediately following the ghost event
Reduces player vision for the remainder of that hunt with a black fog.

positiveEffects: Doubles all ghost activity for 2 minutes which includes interactions, roaming and abilities
negativeEffects: Breaks the fuse box and locks the exit doors for 2 minutes
Sets the ghosts favorite room to a new, random room
Increases sanity drain by +50% of the current rate for the entire group
wishes.note: This wish will override Goryo's weakness. Meaning that despite the Goryo not being able to change rooms on it's own, it CAN if sanity wish is used

wishes.wish: I wish the ghost was trapped
positiveEffects: Teleports the ghost to its room and locks all of its doors for 1 minute
Ghost cannot hunt, roam, or do abilities while locked in its room
negativeEffects: Locks all doors to the room that the player who made the wish is currently in for 1 minute
The ghost will unlock all doors after 1 minute, and start a hunt
25% chance for the doors to unlock AFTER the grace period

wishes.wish: I wish for life / I wish to revive my friend
negativeEffects: 50% chance to kill the player who uses the wish

positiveEffects: Opens up the nearest hiding spot
negativeEffects: Smashes the lights in the room
The ghost can hear and sense the equipment of the player who made the wish during hunts from anywhere on the map for the remainder of the run
wishes.note: This can be used to your advantage to lure a ghost intentionally to a safer area for completing hunt objectives

positiveEffects: Unlocks all exit doors at any time, including during hunts
negativeEffects: Prevents you from moving instantly, then slowly returns movement speed over 5 seconds
Reduces vision for 5 seconds for the person making the wish

positiveEffects: Removes 1 incorrect evidence and corresponding ghost types from your journal, narrowing down your choices
negativeEffects: Starts a hunt near the player
For the rest of the round, the player who made the wish will have reduced vision and muffled audio
wishes.note: Dying will reset audio and visual reductions back to normal and will remain normal if revived

positiveEffects: Allows weather change to Rain, Snow, Clear, Fog, or Sunrise
negativeEffects: Reduces Sanity by 25% for the person who makes the wish
wishes.note: Wishing for rain will give you a 50% chance to get either light or heavy rain

positiveEffects: Wishing for anything will grant you one of the remaining (unused) wishes for that round
wishes.note: While you can use Anything wish more than once, it will not grant you a wish that has already been used in that run
